title: Performance optimization
desc: It’s always possible to disable not necessary widgets in almost any of Jet plugin’s settings to improve the site’s performance

title: Create Front-end submission forms with JetEngine
desc: Activate Forms module in JetEngine plugin and go ahead creating a new form with Insert Post type in form’s Notification Settings

title: WooCommerce cart in a popup
desc: Use JetBlocks Shopping Cart widget in combination with JetPopup plugin and default WooCommerce cart widget

title: Dynamic Tables
desc: Feel free to create dynamic tables by means of repeater type custom field and Dynamic Repeater widget from JetEngine plugin

title: Make use of Autoptimize plugin
desc: Autoptimize plugin helps to minify and compress your CSS and JS files to improve your site’s performance

title: More dynamics within JetElements plugin
desc: Download JetElementsDynamicData plugin from your account and get the opportunity to pull dynamic data from repeater type custom fields with the help of JetElements widgets

title: Showcase the upcoming events using Listing Grid widget
desc: Explore the option to use keywords such as TODAY, YESTERDAY, TODAY + 7 DAYS, etc. to query posts by date in Posts Query settings in Listing Grid widget
